snippet: Joshua Harmon’s comedy, at the Booth Theater, tells of a gay man’s turmoil as he watches wedding bells break up his gang of gal pals....

headline.main: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
headline.print_headline: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months

lead_paragraph: Joshua Harmon’s comedy, at the Booth Theater, tells of a gay man’s turmoil as he watches wedding bells break up his gang of gal pals.
